pkgmetadata.longdescription: Indirect Cross-Validation (ICV) for Kernel Density Estimation // Functions for computing the global and local Gaussian density estimates based on the ICV bandwidth. See the article of Savchuk, O.Y., Hart, J.D., Sheather, S.J. (2010). Indirect cross-validation for density estimation. Journal of the American Statistical Association, 105(489), 415-423 doi:10.1198/jasa.2010.tm08532.
